column5: Thinking of entering a couple bass tournaments this year. Looked over the bassmania tour and it looks interesting.  Can anyone recommend any other leagues???
I just entered the WFN Canadian Open yesterday.  I figure it's a good one seeing who is putting it on.  There is also this one that I found http://www.csfl.ca/

i have fished in the cfsl tourny's twice last year.....had a great time.....didnt even come close but we had a blast....one thing to remeber....get early ;aunch times i think thats the key......andy and vita put on a great event  cheers

Bassmania and Top Bass are great tournaments.  But then again...anytime you can get out fishing, including in a tournament, is a good thing! I dont think there is a "bad" bass tournament, for that reason.
